title: Stroke of Midnight
description: A crowded nightclub. New Year's Eve. He pleasure her 'til the Stroke of Midnight.He counts down the minutes to the new year. Alone in a crowded nightclub. Within hours, he’ll head back to the Middle East for his final tour as a Special Ops Marine. But then Tara hits on him, makes him feel young and alive in a way he hasn’t in years. She gives him hope for a future. But he only has tonight....Time's ticking, but he lives up to his vow to pleasure her 'til the Stroke of Midnight...regardless of who witnesses it.
author: Madison Layle
